*: This utility should only be used in live mode!

This tool should be used in LIVE MODE and to restore the BOOT of BigLinux installed on the HD or SSD.

If the installed system is booting correctly, there are no boot problems, so it is better not to continue using this tool.
Probably also works with other Linux distributions.

Select the desired option: Restore can be done in 3 ways (Simple, Intermediate, or Complete), if in doubt, try the first option, restart the computer and see if it solves the issue. If the problem persists, try the other options.
Option
Description
Simply rewrites the Grub to the beginning of the disk.
Intermediate, reinstall the grub package on the partition, generate the configuration again, and update the initrd.
Complete, execute the steps of the intermediate restoration, update the system, and check if the LTS kernel is installed.
Interactive, opens a terminal within the selected system.
Interactive, opens the control center within the selected system.
Interactive, open the package manager pamac-manager within the selected system.
